#wb_banner {
display: none;
margin: 0 auto;
padding: 0;
background: #0071bc;
align-items: center;
text-align:center;
font-size: 13px;
line-height: 20px;
-webkit-font-smoothing:initial;
}

#wb_banner .wb_banner_text img{
margin:3px 6px 0px 4px;
vertical-align: middle;
width:92px;
}

#wb_banner p {
display: inline;
}
#wb_banner a{
color:#ffffff;
}
#wb_banner a:hover{
text-decoration:none;
}

#wb_banner span {
font-size:13px;
line-height:20px;
}
.wb_banner_image{
display:none;
}
.wb_banner_image img {
vertical-align: middle;
}

.wb_banner_title, .wb_banner_text, .wb_banner_descr, .wb_banner_url a {
font: 15px 'Open Sans';
color:white;
}

#wb_banner .btn-schedule {
    color: #fff;
    border-radius: 15px;
    padding: 3px 17px 3px 10px;
    display: inline-block;
    font-size: 13px;
    line-height: 20px;
margin:0 20px 0 8px;
background:url(https://live.worldbank.org/sites/default/files/white-arrow-right.png) no-repeat calc(100% - 6px) center;
background-color: #004c92;
background-size: 7px;
}
#wb_banner .btn-schedule .fa{
font-size: 16px;
font-weight: 700;
}

#wb_banner input[type="button"]{
background:url('data:image/svg+xml;base64,') no-repeat 0 0;
width: 20px;
height: 20px;
cursor: pointer;
margin: 14px 8px;
border: 0;
background-size: 20px;
text-indent: -9999px;
padding:0;
}

@media(max-width:768px){
  #wb_banner {
    padding:6px 10px;
  }
}

.slide-up {
   max-height: 0;
   height: 0;            
   overflow-y: hidden;
   -webkit-transition: height 0.5s ease-in-out;
   -moz-transition: height 0.5s ease-in-out;
   -o-transition: height 0.5s ease-in-out;
   transition: height 0.5s ease-in-out;
   padding: 0 !important;
}

#wb_banner_container {
  -webkit-font-smoothing: auto !important;
}
#wb_banner_container {
  strong {
    font-size: 14px;
  }
}
